# Error handler

error handler middleware
 
  



## handleValidationErr 
`[function]`
 
**Description:**
Handles Validation Errors, these errors are thrown by
   mongoose when a model validation fails.
 
  



## errorHandler 
`[function]`
 
**Description:**
Error Handler Middleware handles all errors thrown by the application
  and sends a response to the client.
